metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3803 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
nth-check is vulnerable to Inefficient Regular Expression Complexity

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3803` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-nth-check - 2.0.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-nth-check package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.1-1').
